DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Voiding Geometry Explicit
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Shape representation of the void provided as a Brep (the provision of a surface model is not allowed).

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Voiding Geometry Mapped
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Shape representation of the void provided as a reference to a common geometry (the representation map, ako block geometry), inserted through a transformation matrix.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Voiding Geometry SweptSolid
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Shape representation of the void provided as swept solid, with parameterized and arbitrary profiles. The sweeping operation shall only be an extrusion. The provision of a rotation or a sweep along a path is not allowed.
